channel.title: News on fearness.org
channel.description: Recent content in News on fearness.org

item.title: The Good News
item.description: He is so close I can almost sense it. Every time I feel a chill go down my back I know that its the waves of purity that are radiated by the genuine soul lord Cthulhu! It has been six years, six months and six days since his last return. My fingers ache as I struggle to type this to keep you up to date on the latest Cthulhu news.
